author: veithen
msg: - Move the remaining Maven modules out of the "modules" directory so that the entire structure of the entire tree becomes canonical, with artifact ID = directory name.
- With that structure, the SCM info for submodules is calculated correctly by Maven. No need to override it.
- Also correct the SCM info in the root POM.
